manipulation.image.JPEG

Class Huffman

  • java.lang.Object
    • manipulation.image.JPEG.Huffman

  • public class Huffman
extends java.lang.Object

    Class which handles Huffman Table of a JPEG image

    • Constructor Detail

      • Huffman

        public Huffman(short tableClass,
               short tableID,
               short[] codeLengths,
               short[] codeSymbols)

        Constructor, creates a new Huffman using the specified parameters.

        Parameters:
        tableClass - the class of the Huffman table
        tableID - the id of the Huffman table
        codeLengths - a 16 long array containing the amount of codes at the index'ed length
        codeSymbols - the symbols sorted by their Huffman codes

    • Method Detail

        Returns:
        string representation of the JPEG file

        public java.lang.String addNewSymbol(byte symbol)
                              throws java.lang.Exception

        Gets the Huffman code for the supplied symbol, and adds the symbol if it's not already present and there's space.

        symbol - the symbol to get the code of
        Returns:
        the Huffman code of the symbol

      • checkSpace

        public boolean checkSpace()

        Checks if there is space to add a new symbol in the Huffman tree.

        Returns:
        boolean value indicating if a new symbol can be added

      • spaceLength

        public int spaceLength()

        Checks if there is space in the current Huffman table for new codes.

        Returns:
        integer value indicating the length at which there is space to add a new symbol

        Adds the specified symbol to the Huffman tree, returning the modified tree.

        Parameters:

        symbol - the symbol to be added
        length - the length fo the symbol
